extensionDescription.message: Export/Import/Sync bookmarks to WebDAV or PHP.

optionsStartupHint.message: You can enable this after 'Import' or 'Remove'

optionsBTNRemoveHint.message: This removes all your current bookmarks!

optionsBTNImportHint.message: Add all bookmarks newer than the last sync to your existing bookmarks.

optionsBTNExportHint.message: Export all bookmarks to the server.

optionsNotUsed.message: It looks like you haven't used the add-on yet. You can now import any bookmarks saved on the server with "Import". If you have already created bookmarks in your browser, it might be a good idea to delete them with "Remove".

optionsErrorURL.message: Login failed: Please check the WebDAV URL. It should be in a form like https://servername/folder

optionsErrorUser.message: Login failed: Please check username and password.

optionsBeforeImport.message: You have bookmarks saved in your library. Would you like to remove them before you import new bookmarks?

optionsInfoRemove.message: When you continue, all your current bookmarks are removed. Are you sure?

popupImportConfirm.message: The bookmarks stored on the server are now added. Are you sure?

errorGetBookmarks.message: There was a error retrieving the bookmarks from the server. The status response is:

errorSaveBookmarks.message: There was some error saving all bookmarks. The status response is:

errorSaveSingleBookmarks.message: There was a error saving the bookmark to PHP. The status response is:
errorSaveSingleBookmarks.description: http error when saving single bookmark.

errorExportBookmarks.message: There was a problem exporting the bookmarks.

errorImportBookmark.message: There was a error importing the bookmark:

errorRemoveBookmark.message: There was some error removing the bookmark.

errorMoveBookmark.message: There was some error moving the bookmark at the PHP server. The status response is:

internalError.message: An internal error is occurred. The message was:

infoNewClient.message: This browser seems to be a new client for the server. The client is now registered at the server. No bookmarks are imported. You can import them manually.
infoNewClient.description: New Client, unknown to the server.

infoNoChange.message: 0 added, moved, deleted bookmarks in last sync.
infoNoChange.description: Message if no data has changed on the server.

infoChanges.message: changes on the server since the last sync.
infoChanges.description: Message if no data has changed on the server.

infoEmptyConfig.message: Configuration is empty. Maybe thats a new installation, please configure the options before use.
infoEmptyConfig.description: Message if extension is not configured yet.
